message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. As we're just starting the negotiation, I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $800000. This is a great starting point, and I'm confident we can work together to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I believe we can find a price that works well for both of us. My counteroffer for the product is $950000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. However, I still need to make a profit on this deal. My counteroffer is $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product brings to the table.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I've considered your latest offer and would like to propose a counteroffer of $875000. I hope this aligns better with our mutual interests.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your persistence, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession. My counteroffer is $850000. I believe this is the best I can do, and I hope you can see the value in the product.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $862500. I believe this offers a fair compromise for both of us.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I've given it a lot of thought, and I'm willing to make one more concession. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $850000. I believe this is the best price I can offer, and I hope you can understand my position. My final counteroffer is $850000.
